Mu ndwi iheze, mu birori vy'uguhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Assomption, Pascal Nyabenda arongoye inama nshingamateka, yasavye abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika kuguma hagati na hagati, ntiberekane aho bahagaze mu vya politike kuko ngo bitsitaza abakirisu. Mu kumwishura, Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, Yohakimu Ntahondereye, yamenyesheje ko bazovuga ijambo ry'Imana uko riri ata gucisha iruhande, "n'aho hari aho rigera rikababaza".

headline: Kenya: Umupasitori yishe umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero
text: Umupasitori wo muri Kenya yatangaje abakirisu igihe yacumita umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bari gusenga ejo ku wa Mungu, mu rusengero bafatanije gushinga mu gisagara ca Mombasa. Abakirisu bari muri urwo rusengero babwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko Elisha Misiko yari yicaye mu kibanza c'imbere, igihe umugore wiwe nawe, Ann Mghoi, yari kuri arutari ariko arasigura. Niho umugabo wiwe Misiko yamusangayo n'imbugita yari yanyegeje mw'ishati yari yambaye amucumita mu mugongo. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bapfa uburongozi bw'urwo rusengero rwitwa 3 G (Grounds for God's Gospel). Umwe mu bakirisu basengera muri urwo rusengero ati: "Twebwe twibaza ko cari ikintu yari agiye kumubwira, kumbe yari agiye kumucumita imbugita". Uwundi ati: "Uyu mugabo yari yarubakanye n'uyu mupfasoni arongoye uru rusengero, ariko bari barahukanye. Yari amaze kumutera ubwoba incuro nyinshi, kandi yari yanavuze ko azokora ivyo yakoze uno munsi". Ahejeje kumucumitaniho  nawe yaca yicumita mu nda, agerageza no kwikata izosi, mu gihe abakirisu bari bagiye gutabara. Uyo mugabo yaciye apfa ubwo nyene, mu gihe umugore wiwe yagiye gupfira mu bitaro. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bari baratandukanye bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero, aho umwe wese yashaka kuba ari we mukuru, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Daily Nation. Rwari rusigaye ruyobowe n'umugore, ivyo Pasitori Misiko, umugabo wiwe, atashaka kwumva.

headline: Ubwa mbere mu mateka ya Katolika, Papa yagenye umugore muri sinodi y'abepiskopi
text: Ubwa mbere mu mateka ya Ekleziya, Papa yagenye umugore nk'icegera c'umunyamabanga w'inama nkuru y'Abeposkopi. Umubikira Nathalie Becquart, ava mu Bufaransa, azoba afise uburenganzira bwo gutora muri iyo nama, isanzwe ihanura Papa kandi ikaganira ku bibazo bimwe bimwe nkoramutima muri Ekleziya Katolika. Umubikira Becquart yari asanzwe akorana n'iyi sinodi y'Abepiskopi (inama nkuru y'abasenyeri yiga ibibazo nkoramutima vya Ekleziya Katolika) kuva mu 2019 nk'umujenama. Umunyamabanga mukuru w'iyi nama nkuru, Kardinali Mario Grech avuga ko iri genwa ryerekana ko "umuryango wuguruye". Avuga ko iyi ngingo yerekana ko Papa yipfuza ko "abagore bagira uruhara runini mu gufata ingingo muri Ekleziya". Umunyamakuru wa BBC John McManus avuga ko iyi ngingo iterekana ko abagore bashobora kwatirwa mw'ibanga ry'ubusaserdoti, n'aho bamwe mu badashima iyi ngingo babona ko ari yo ibintu bitera bija. Luis Marín de San Martín, umupatiri wo muri Esupanye, na we nyene yagenywe kuba icegera c'umunyamabanga w'iyi nama. Muri ino myaka iheze, Sinodi y'Abepiskopi yaraganiriye ku bibazo nkoramutima bijanye n'ukwemera kw'Ekleziya, harimwo ikibazo c'ingene bakwiye gufata Abakatolika bubatse n'abapfakaye. Iyi ngingo ije haciye ikiringo kidashika ukwezi Papa Francis ahinduye itegeko rya Ekleziya kugira ngo yemerere abagore gusangiza no kurangura amabanga ya Arutari, n'aho iri tegeko rishimangira ko ibanga ry'ubusaserdoti ribandanya kuba iry'abagabo gusa. Hagati aho, mu mwaka uheze, Papa yaragenye abagore batandatu mu nama nkuru ijejwe gukurikirana ikigega ca Vaticano.

headline: Eritrea ‘yigaruriye ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyegukira katolika’
text: Amakuru ashikira BBC igisata c'ururimi rwa Tigrinya, amenyesha ko leta y'igihugu ca Eritrea yategetse Ekleziya Katolika gushikiriza ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyose bisanzwe vyegukira iryo dini. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, abategetsi basavye abarongoye ivyo bigo  gutera igikumu ku rwandiko rwemeza ko babishikirije. Ariko abarongoye ivyo bigo nka bose baranse gushira umukono kuri urwo rwandiko, basaba ahubwo ko bovugana n'abarongoye iryo shengero. Inyuma y'aho, abajejwe umutekano bategetse abakozi bavyo gusohoka, baca baravyugara. Nta wuzi igituma ubutegetsi bwa Eritrea bufashe iyo ngingo. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane uno mwaka, abasenyeri ba Ekleziya Katolika muri Eritrea barasavye ko hotanguzwa umugambi w'ukunywanisha mu gihugu, ivyotuma abanyagihugu bose batunganirwa. Mu rwandiko rw'impapuro 30 rwanditswe n'abo basenyeri inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro hagati y'ico gihugu na Ethiopia, bamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko abanyagihugu bonywanishwa kugira ngo igihugu gikire. Basavye ubutegetsi ko bwogira impinduka zotuma abanyagihugu batipfuza guhunga igihugu.

headline: Rwanda - Coronavirus: Katolika yafashe ingingo zijanye no gukinga ico kiza
text: Ekleziya Katolika mu Rwanda ihamagarira abakirisu gukurikiza amategeko atangwa n'inzego zijejwe amagara y'abantu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda wa mugera ruhonyabantu coronavirus, yiswe Covid-19. Ivyo biri mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe na Antoine Kambanda, Umwepiskopi mukuru wa Diyoseze nkuru ya Kigali akaba n'icegera c'Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, aho amenyesha ingingo zafashwe mu makoraniro zizofasha abakirisu babo kudakoranako ngo bahave bandukizanya. Ibihugu bishika umunani ku mugabane wa Afrika bimaze gutangaza ko uwo mugera wamaze kubishikamwo, leta z'u Burundi n'u Rwanda zikaba ziherutse gutangaza ingingo zafashe mu ntumbero yo kwirinda no gukinga uwo mugera. Mw'iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda isaba abakirisu "guhana amahoro ya Kristu ku mutima gusa ata guhana ibiganza canke guhoberana". Isaba kandi ko "mu gihe co gusangira (guhazwa mu Kinyarwanda) ari ugutega ibiganza, atagutega ururimi". Iyo nama yafashe kandi ingingo yo gukura "amazi y'umugisha" (amazi ahezagiye mu kirundi) mu twombo yashirwamwo mw'isengero, maze abakirisu bakaja barayakoramwo mu kugira urumenyetso rw'umusaraba. Basaba abakirisu kudasubira gukora aho yahora ashirwa kuko atakirimwo "kugeza igihe ikibazo kizoba gikemutse". Muri iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepisikopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, yemereye abakirisitu ko izobandanya ikurikirana uko bimeze, ikazofata n'izindi ngingo zo kwikingira ni vyaba ngombwa. Gushika ubu, ibihugu birenga 80 biramaze guterwa n'uwo mugera watanguriye mu gisagara ca Wuhan c'intara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, ibihugu vya Togo, Nigeria, Senegal, Misiri, Algeria, Tuniziya, Afrika y'Epfo na Cameroon nivyo bimaze guterwa n'uwo mugera. Mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwo mugera, ibihugu vy'u Rwanda n'u Burundi biherutse gutangaza ingingo vyafashe mu ntumbero yo gukinga ko ishika muri vyo. U Burundi  bwatangaje ko ingenzi zivuye mu bihugu vy'u Bushinwa, Koreya y'epfo, Iran, Ubutaliyani, Ubudage, Ubufaransa, Ubuyapani na Espanye zizobanza gushirwa mu kibanza categuwe ukwazo nyene mu kiringo c'iminsi 14. Nayo mu Rwanda, leta isaba abanyagihugu "kugabanya ingendo zitari ngombwa" mu bihugu birangwamwo coronavirus, yongera kandi itangaza n'ingingo zitandukanye harimwo n'izo isuku, kugira ngo birinde kwandura.

headline: Papa Francis yashoboye gusoma imisa ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro inyuma yo kubagwa urura
text: Papa Francis yashoboye kwiyereka abantu ubwa mbere kuva bamukoze kubera ingorane y'urura runini, haraciye indwi. Mu gihe yaboneka ko ameze neza, uyu mupapa w'imyaka 84 yasomye imisa yo muri ino ndwi ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro  Gemelli i Roma. Abantu baharurwa mu majana bakoraniye hanze y'ibi bitaro, bamwe bakoma akaruru ngo "Viva il Papa!" (Twogereranya na "Papa, ramba"). Vaticano ivuga ko igikorwa co kuvura Papa indwara y'urura runini izwi nka "symptomatic diverticular stenosis" cagenze neza. Papa yabwiye abari aho ati: "Ndanezerewe kubona nshoboye kurangura ibanga ryanje ryo ku wa Mungu n'aho ndi ng'aha". "Narumvise ko mwambaye hafi cane kandi ko mwansengeye. Ndabashimiye n'umutima wanje wose". Ashimira abakozi bo muri ivyo bitaro, yavuze ko "yiboneye ingene ubuvuzi bwiza ari nkenerwa, kandi bose bakaburonka, mu bindi bihugu nk'uko bimeze hano mu Butariyano". Yongerako ati: "Ntidutakaze aya mahirwe. Ni ngombwa ko tuyabungabunga". Bamwe mu bana barwariye muri ivyo bitaro babonetse bari kumwe na Papa ku rubaraza. Ntibiramenyekana ikiringo azomara muri ibi bitaro mu gihe azoba ariko ararwaruka. Indwara ya Diverticular ni indwara itera ibivyimba mu rura runini, bigashobora gutuma rwipfungānya, bigatuma umuntu yuzura inda akanababara mu nda. Francis, yavutse mu  1936 i Buenos Aires, yaratakaje igice c'ihaha ry'iburyo afise imyaka 21. Afise kandi ikibazo co mu matako kimutera ububabare buhera mu gice co hasi c'umugongo bukamanuka mu maguru. Mu 2014, yagiye ahagarika ibikorwa bimwe bimwe kubera ibibazo vyo mu mushishito.

headline: Abavugabutumwa bo muri Africa bariko basabira Trump ngo atsinde amatora
text: N'aho asanzwe afise imvugo y'agasuzuguro kuri Afrika, Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arakunzwe cane na bamwe mu bihaye Imana bo kuri uyu mugabane. Mu nyigisho ziwe yatanze mu kwa gatandatu, Pasitori wo muri Nijeriya, Chris Oyakhilome, umuvugabutumwa azwi cane ku mboneshakure, yagize ati: "Mumusengere [Trump] kuko iyo Imana ishize imbere umwe mu bana biwe, shetani rimwe na rimwe ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo imusambure". Agabisha kandi ko abanegura uyu mukuru w'igihugu akomoka mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika ariko arondera kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu kwa cumi na rimwe banka urunuka abamushigikiye. Uyu mupasitori akunzwe cane kw'isi yose, harimwo na Amerika avuga ati: "Bafitiye ishavu ryinshi Trump kubera arwanira abakristu/abakristo, ico mukimenye. Rero abankwa ni mwebwe abakristu". Ikigo Pew Research gikora ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y'abantu kivuga ko mu gihe Perezida Trump azwi ko ari umutegetsi yacanishijemwo isi, mu bihugu nka Nijeriya na Kenya arakundwa cane nk'uko amatohoza y'iki kigo yavyerekanye mu kwa mbere uno mwaka. Kivuga ko amajambo yavuze mu 2018 yo kugereranya ibihugu vya Afrika "nk'imisarani" bobo ko ata kibazo ateye. Ibi bihugu vyompi bisanzwe bizwi ko bigendera cane ku madini. Mu bumanuko bwa Nijeriya, igihugu ca Afrika gifise abantu benshi, harangwamwo amashengero menshi, mu gihe muri Kenya naho abanyapolitike bakoresha cane amashengero mu gutanga ubutumwa ku banywanyi babo, ari naco gituma amadini afise ikibanza kinini muri ibi bihugu. Amashengero menshi ya kikristu muri Afrika, asanzwe arwanya cane ivyo gukorora inda, abubakana bahuje ibitsina, bakongera bagashigikira Israyeli, ntibigeze biyumvamwo uwasubiriwe na Trump, umu Democrate Barack Obama, n'aho afise amamuko muri Kenya. Richard Chogo, Pasitori mu rusengero rwa Deliverance ku mugwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwarahimirije umugambi w'ukwigenga (liberalisme) hano muri Afrika, kandi uwu mugambi wateje impungenge mu bategetsi bamwe bamwe b'amadini. Rero kabaye agahengwe ku butegetsi bwa Trump yahisemwo gusubiza ibirenge inyuma". Arashimagiza ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona bwarashoboye guhagarika imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe nka Marie Stopes, yafasha mu buryo bwo kugabanya imvyaro n'ugukoroza inda mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika. Iri shirahamwe ryaraneguye iyi ngingo ya Amerika yo guhagarika izi mfashanyo, rivuga ko rishira "ubuzima bw'abakenyezi mu kaga". Impari ku bijanye no gukoroza inda zimaze imyaka n'imiburiburi irenga 40. Kuva ico gihe, abavugabutumwa b'abazungu bagize uruhara rukomeye mu matora ku ruhande rw'aba Repubulika kandi ivyiyumviro vyabo vyarakwiye kw'isi yose, cane cane muri Afrika. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe Abaporotesanti b'abirabure benshi muri Amerika bashigikiye umugambwe uharanira Demokarasi kandi bakanegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump, nk'uko icegeranyo gishasha ca  Pew Research kivyerekana. Emeka Ezeji, umupasitori mukuru mw'ishengero rya Anglicani mu ntara ya Enugu iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nijeriya, avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vya politike bishingiye "ku vyanditswe" gusa. Avuga ati: "Abakristu ba Afrika bazi ko umukuru w'igihugu w'umu Repubulika ari we mwiza kuri Amerika no kw'isi". Abandanya asengera Perezida Trump ko yotsinda umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi Joe Biden mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe, kandi ko yari yafashe umwanya iminsi yose wo gusengera uyu mukuru w'igihugu ngo akire igihe aheruka mu bitaro  kubera coronavirus. Nk'uko bimeze kuri Pasitori Chogo, na we nyene abona ko "intege nke" za Trump zidategerezwa kurengera "inyungu rusangi". Nk'akarorero, ariyamiriza rya sekeza rya Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), isekeza Trump afata ko ari "ikimenyetso c'urwanko", akavuga ko "ryanyazwe intumbero yaryo". Yibaza ibibazo vyinshi aho avuga ati: "Abandi bantu atari abazungu nta vanguraruhu bakorerwa? Ubuzima bw'umwirabure abayabaye ubu bwoba ari bwiza ugereranije n'imyaka indwi iheze? Canke umwirabure abayabaye ubu yoba ageramiwe ubu kuri Trump gusumba kuri Obama?" Bwana Trump arirata ko ari we mu perezida wa Amerika amaze gukorera ivyiza vyinshi Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika gusumba abandi baperezida bose  mu mateka ya  Amerika, kenshi agafatira ku rugero ruto rw'ubushomeri mu myaka itatu ya mbere y'ubutegetsi bwiwe, ico Bwana Ezeji akenguruka cane. Ubunyamabanga bujejwe akazi buvuga ko igitigiri c'abashomeri b'abirabure mu kw'icenda ari co gitigiri gito cane cabayeho kuva butanguye kwegeranya ibiharuro nk'ibi mu myaka ya 1970, n'aho ibi vyahindutse kubera coronavirus. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji  avuga ko Bwana Trump agifise igikorwa kinini ategerezwa gukora ku neza ya bose, aha akaba afatira ku mwami Cyrus (Kuro) w'umu perse avugwa muri Biblia ko yari yatoranijwe n'Imana kugira ngo yigarurire Babiloni, maze abanya Isirayeli bari bahunze  banona gusubira i Yerusalemu. Avuga ati: "Trump niwe we Kuro wa kino gihe". Bwana Emeka  avuga ati: "Imana irabivuze....ni umusuku wanje azorangura ishaka ryanje". Pasitori Juliet Eyimofe Binite ari mu gisagara ca Lagos muri Nijeriya aremeranya nawe. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Yatowe n'Imana". Buri ku ndwi, uyu mupasitori w'umugore yama asengera  Trump ngo atsinde amatora ku ncuro ya kabiri. Avuga ko Imana yamuhaye ubutumwa imbere y'amatora ya 2016 ko hari umuntu atunze cane yinjiye muri politike kandi ko ashigikiye ubwigenge bw'amadini, abakristu babona ko bubangamiwe. Avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yariko irarondera umukozi, umuntu w'intungane kubera hari ibikorwa bimwe bimwe abantu beza badashobora gukora". "Dukeneye umuntu ashobora kurwanira agateka k'abemera". Avuga kandi ko Trump ataronka amashimwe akwiriye kuri politike yiwe mpuzamakungu, nk'akarorero amasezerano y'amahoro hagati ya Isirayeli na Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abararu (Emirats Arabes Unis). Pasitori Chogo na we nyene niko abibona: "N'aho woba uri Saddam Hussein cane Muammar Gaddafi, ntihabuze nk'ikintu kimwe canke bibiri vyiza wakoreye abanyagihugu bawe". Avuga ko Trump ashigikiwe ku mugabane wa Afrika kubera ukuntu atarya umunwa, aho avuga ko abategetsi ba Afrika bakeneye kubwirwa mu majambo yeruye kugira ngo bashobore gutunganya ibihugu vyabo. Mu butumwa butandukanye yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Bwana Trump aherutse kwibutsa abakristu bamushigikiye ko ubwisanzure mu vyo gusenga hamwe n'urugamba rwo kurwanya umugenzo wo gukoroza inda bishobora gukwama mu gihe atotsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji afata ibintu yishimikije ubuhanuzi bwa Bibiliya buvuga ibihe vya nyuma. Ati: "Ko azotsinda canke atazotsinda, ico si ikibazo ca Trump, ahubwo ni ikibazo c'ivyo Imana ivuga". "Trump ni nka ca giti co muri Biblia abihweza ibirere bafatirako mu kwihweza ibimenyetso vy'ibihe...aramutse atsinze, tuzoba tugifise igihe co kubaho, nayo akaramuka atsinzwe nta gihe tuzoba tugisigaje".

headline: Burundi: Abarongoye Islam bavuga ko ata ngorane ihari hagari ya Islam na reta
text: Abakuru b'idini rya Islam bavuga ko biyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe na Ndikumana Rashid, umusilamu aherutse kwifatira mu gahanga umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, iterambere rusangi n'umutekano. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ihuriro ry'imisigiti riri kumwe n'ihuriro ry'aba-Imam mu Burundi, bamenyesha ko ivyo Ndikumana yavuze yabivuze ku gatwe kiwe bitega aya mahuriro canke "umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi". Ndikumana arapfunzwe inyuma y'uko yumvikanye ahamagarira umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati n'umutekano, Ndirakobuca Gervais, gusaba ikigongwe, hari mu musigiti wa Madina uri muri zone Buterere mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Umwe mu bakuru b'idini rya Islam mu Burundi yabwiye BBC ko gushika ubu nta kibabuza gusenga uko bamye basenga na mbere. Abakuriye Islam mu Burundi mw'itangazo ryabo, bamenyesha abanywanyi babo ko "ata matati ari hagati y'umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi" na reta y'igihugu. Zuberi Mohamed, Umukuru w'inama ya bose mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi, yabwiye BBC ko bakira nk'abandi bose ivyashikirijwe na Ndirakobuca, kuko "vyaraba bose ntivyaraba aba Islam gusa". Avuga ko ivyo yavuze bitababuza gusenga uko bahora basenga. Ati: "Nta tegeko na rimwe rirasohoka ritubuza gusenga canke ritubuza guhamagarira abantu kuja gusenga. "Twebwe dufata y'uko yariko ashikiriza amakenga yoba afise canke uko abona ibintu". Zuberi avuga ko iyo habaye ingorane hagati ya reta no mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi "hariho inzira bicamwo kugira ngo tuvugane, nk'uko biri mu yandi madini". Abajijwe niba ivyasabwe n'umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano, Rashidi abona ko ata ngorane bishobora gutera. Ati: "Abatovyi mu mpande zose ntibabuze, ariko twebwe turazi ko aba Islam bahagaze neza, kandi ko ata ngorane zihava ziva muri ivyo gushika kuri uno munota nta kibazo kihari hagati ya reta n'aba Islam mu Burundi".

headline: Burundi: 'Turiyamirije abatwitiranya n'umugambwe' - Abepiskopi gatolika
text: Inama y'Abepiskopi b'i Burundi imenyesha ko ibabajwe n'uko hari bamwe bashaka kuyitiranya n'umugambwe biturutse ku gikorwa bakoze mu matora aheruka nk'indorerezi, mbere bakanashikiriza amahinyu bayabonyewo. Biri mw'itangazo ryasomwe n'umukuru w'iyo nama musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye atanga umuco ku ruhara rwayo muri ayo matora. Iyo nama imenyesha ko itishimiye ingene sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro yavuze ivyo yashikirijwe "nk'uko yoba yaritwaye ku vyerekeye amatora". Ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu, iyo sentare niho yashikiriza ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa 20/05/2020, aho yanavuze ko utunenge twashikirijwe n'inama y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, co kimwe n'ibirego vyatanzwe n'umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ata shingiro bifise. Mw'iryo tangazo, musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye  arongoye inama y'abepiskopi amenyesha ko itigeze yitwara muri sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingio. Ati: "Ico yakoze kwabaye ukugira ico ishikirije icese ku vyerekeye igikorwa c'uburorerezi yari yaronkeye uruhusha". Abasenyeri b' i Burundi bavuga ko ata mvo n'imwe yari ihari y'uko bitwara ngo kuko uruhara rwabo muri ayo matora cari igikorwa c'umurorerezi kandi bakagendera ku ngingo ngenganyifato y'abarorerezi b'amatora. Avuga ko igikorwa c'abarorerezi kwari ukwandika n'ukugumya gusa amahinyu y'ivyabaye yiboneye n'amaso yiwe gusa. Musenyeri Ntahondereye ati: "Turababajwe n'uko Inama y'abepiskopi yafashwe mu buryo butumvikana nk'uko yoba yaritwaye , ivyo navyo bigatera agapfungu mu mitima y'abantu". "Turanse ko twitiranywa n'umugambwe canke n'umuntu uwo ari we wese yahiganywe mu matora". Inama nkuru y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, CECAB, yararungitse abarorerezi bayo barenga 2,700 mu makomine yose bashoboye kuja mu tuzu tw'amatora bahisemwo, nk'uko babivuga mw'itangazo ryabo ryo ku wa 26/05, iminsi ine inyuma y'ayo matora. Mw'iryo tangazo bari bamenyesheje ko ayo matora yabayemwo utunenge twari gushobora gutuma ivyari gutangazwa ko vyayavuyemwo bishobora kutizigirwa. Inyuma y'iryo tangazo, hari bamwe babonye ko Ekleziya Gatorika mu Burundi itari yishimiye ivyari vyaraye bitangajwe n'umurwi CENI ko ari vyo vyavuye mu matora. Hagati aho, inyuma y'aho Evariste Ndayishimiye w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi atangarijwe burundu na sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro ko ari we yatsinze ayo matora, iyo nama y'abepiskopi yaranamukeje mw'itangazo ryayo ryo ku wa 05/06, inamusaba kuba "umukuru w'igihugu wa bose".

headline: Nigeria: Umupasitori atangisha 700$ kugira yereke abantu 'irembo ribashikana mw’ijuru’
text: Umuvugabutumwa muri Nigeria ari mu yabira inyuma yo kubwira abantu ko azi irembo ribashikana mw'ijuru riri mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'ico gihugu, ariko ko kugira aribereke bategerezwa gutanga amafaranga. Pasitori Ade Abraham yarezwe mu gipolisi n'umwe mu banywanyi biwe avuga ko uyo mu pasitori yamutangishije 310.000 y'amanaira (amafaranga yo muri Nigeria), angana n'amadorari y'abanyamerika 750, kugira ngo bashobore kubona iryo rembo avuga ko riri mu gisagara ca Araromi-Ugbeshi, mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu muvugabutumwa yemereye BBC ko koko yabwiye abantu ivy'iryo rembo, akavuga ko ari "Imana akorera" yarimweretse mu ntumbero yo kuraba aho abanyashengero biwe bageza mu kwemera kwabo, ariko akavuga ko ata muntu n'umwe aramuha amafaranga. Ishirahamwe ry'Abakristu muri Nigeria ryasohoye itangazo ryikurako uyo mupasitori Ade Abraham, igipolisi co mu ntara ya Ekiti naco kikaba cegeranije inzandiko z'abanywanyi b'ishengero ryiwe, kikaba catanguye amatohoza. Ishengero rya Pasitori Ade Abraham ryahora rifise icicaro mu ntara ya Kogi, mu nyuma ryimukira mu ntara ya Kaduna, imbere y'uko ryimukira amaja mu bumanuko n'abanywanyi baryo, mw'ikambi yubatse mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu munyashengero yamureze ku gipolisi yaciye yisubirira muhira iwe i Kaduna kuva ico gihe, ariko umugore wiwe yaranse kumukurikira, akavuga ko "igihe c'umunezero" cari kigiye gushika vuba. Ariko uyu mugabo n'umugore badashaka ko amazina yabo amenyekana babwiye BBC ko babandanya bavugana kuri terefone umusi ku musi. Pasitori Ade, azwi kandi kw'izina rya Noah Abraham (Nowa Aburahamu), aherutse kwerekanwa mw'ireresi yazungurutse cane, aho yariko asaba abasenga Imana gutera akamo incuti zabo ziri mu mahanga gutanga intererano y'amafaranga mu rusengero rwiwe.

headline: Umurwi Man Utd uvuga ko 'ubabajwe cane' n'ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ryakorewe Paul Pogba
text: Manchester United ivuga ko iriko "irakora amatohoza kugira imenye" abakwiragije ku mbuga hwaniro inzandiko z'amacakubiri y'urukoba ku mukinyi Paul Pogba akina hagati muri uwo murwi. Pogba w'imyaka 26 yahushije penalty ejo ku wa mbere mu rukino rwahuje Man United na Wolves, ruza kurangira ari igitsindo kimwe ku kindi. Agize umukinyi wa gatatu mu kiringo c'indwi imwe gusa akorewe ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga hwaniro kubera yahushije penalty, inyuma ya Yakou Méïté wa Reading na Tammy Abraham wa Chelsea. Umurwi wa Man United uvuga ko "ubabajwe cane" n'iryo tyozwa kandi ko "uryiyamirije wivuye inyuma". Mw'itangazo wasohoye uvuga uti: "Abo bantu banditse ivyo baciye kubiri n'akaranga k'umurwi wacu rurangiranwa kandi urahimiriza abakunzi bawo ko bokwiyamiriza ivyo bintu ku mbuga hwaniro ari benshi". "Manchester United ntishobora kwihanganira na gato amacakubiri canke ikumira iryo ari ryo ryose kandi itanguje isekeza #AllRedAllEqual initiative rizomara igihe kirekire ry'ukurwanya ako kabi". "Tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira tumenye abo bose babigizemwo uruhara twongere dufate n'ingingo ruhasha zose zishoboka. Dusavye kandi n'amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro gufata ingingo muri iyi ntumbero". Ku munsi wa Mungu, umusatirizi Yakou Méïté wa Reading yariyamirije ityoza rifatiye ku rukoba yakorewe ku mbuga hwaniro inyuma y'aho ahushirije penalty. Uyo mukinyi akomoka muri Côte d'Ivoire w'imyaka 23, yinjiye ku munota wa 80 igihe Reading yahura na Cardiff aca ahusha penalty ku munota wa 91. Mu ndwi iheze, Chelsea yariyamirije "inzandiko z'urwanko" ku mukinyi Tammy Abraham inyuma y'aho uyo murwi utsindiwe na Liverpool mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Super Cup. Umumenyereza wa Chelsea  Frank Lampard avuga ko "yababajwe cane" n'ityozwa ry'uyo mukinyi w'imbere w'imyaka 21. Asaba amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ahagarike ingeso y'ukwifatira mu gahanga abakinyi. Eka n'abandi bakunzi ntibatevye kwiyamiriza ama tweet yarimwo amajambo y'amacakubiri yanditswe kuri Pogba - yari yaronse penalty kw'ikosa yakorewe mu nyuma arayihusha - ejo ku munsi wa mbere. Ama tweets amwe amwe yarafuswe, mu gihe n'ama "comptes" atari make nayo nyene yasa n'ayari yafuswe. Amategeko ngenderwako ya Twitter avuga ko "ishobora gufata ingingo ku nyifato y'ugutyoza abantu". Mu kwezi kw'indwi, ishirahamwe rirwanya amacakubiri y'urukoba, Kick It Out, ryarasohoye icegeranyo cerekana ko amakuru ajanye n'amacakubiri y'urukoba yiyongereye ku bice 43% mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, aho yabonetse incuro 274 ugereranije na 192 yari yabonetse mu mwaka waheruka.

headline: Mason Greenwood: Umusatiziri wa Manchetser United yarekuwe vy’agateganyo
text: Umusatirizi wa Manchester United Mason Greenwood yarekuwe vy'agateganyo inyuma yo guhagarikwa yagirizwa gufata ku nguvu umugore. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 20 yahagaritswe kandi ku wa Mungu yagirizwa ihohotera, inyuma y'uko yagirijwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Mu nyuma yahagaritswe yagirizwa ko yafashe umuntu ku nguvu mbere agatera ubwoba bwo kwica umuntu ku wa kabiri. Manchester United yari yamenyesheje ko uyu musatirizi atari gusubira mu myimenyerezo gushika hafashwe izindi ngingo. Igipolisi ca Greater Manchester cavuze ko Greenwood yahagaritswe inyuma y'aho kimenyeye ko "hari amashusho n'amareresi yashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro n'umugore yavuga ihohotera yakorewe". Iki gipolisi kivuga ko abacamanza bari bategetse ko aguma mu gasho gushika ku wa gatatu ariko ubu yarekuwe vy'agateganyo mu gihe ayandi matohoza akibandanya. Inyuma y'aho uyu musatirizi ahagarikiwe, ikigo EA Sports gikora udukino two kuri videwo cavuze ko Greenwood yakuwe mu dukino twa FIFA. Cavuze ko yari yakuwe mu gakino kitwa FIFA 22 aca akurwa no ku rutonde rw'abo gikoresha mu gakino FIFA Ultimate Team hamwe na Ultimate Draft. Ikompanyi ikora ivyambarwa vy'abanonotsi, Nike, yari yamenyesheje ko ihagaritse imigenderanire n'uyu mukinyi. Umuvugizi wayo yavuze ati: "Turababajwe cane n'ibi birego kandi tuzobandanya dukurikiranira hagufi iki kibazo". Amaze gutangura gukinira Manchester United mu kwa gatatu 2019, Greenwood yarateye igikumu mu kwa kabiri kw'umwaka uheze ku masezerano yo gukinira uyu murwi mu kiringo c'imyaka ine, amaze gutera intambwe nk'umwe mu bigishijwe n'uyu murwi. Ku wa Mungu, uyu murwi wavuze ko "udashobora kwihanganira ihohotera iryo ari ryo ryose" kandi ko wari wamenyeshejwe ivyo uyu mukinyi yagirizwa, ariko ko ataco wari kuvuga imbere y'uko "ukuri kumenyekana ku vyabaye". Mu rindi tangazo ryasohowe ejo ku wa kabiri, uyu murwi washimangiye ko wiyamiriza wivuye inyuma ihohotera iryo ari ryo ryose.

headline: Zambia yahagaritse urukino rwa kivandimwe na Afrika y’Epfo kubera ibitero ku banyamahanga
text: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Zambia (FAZ) ryahagaritse urukino rwa kivandimwe rwoyihuje na Afrika y'Epfo kuri uyu wa gatandatu ku mugwa mukuru Lusaka. Iyo ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'ibitero vyakozwe ku banyamahanga mu gihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo. Abanyagihugu ba Zambia baciye ku mbuga hwaniro barasavye ko iryo shirahamwe FAZ rihagarika urukino hagati ya Chipolopolo na Bafana Bafana nk'ukwerekana akababaro. Umukuru wa FAZ Adrian Kashala yemeje iyo ngingo, yongera ko y'uko urwo rukino rwungururijwe ku rindi genekerezo ritamenyekanye, inyuma y'aho babonaniye n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika y'Epfo, SAFA. Muri uwo mwanya nyene, leta ya Zambia yahanuye abadereva b'amakamyo ko bohagarika ingendo zabo muri Afrika y'Epfo gushika umutekano ugarutse muri ico gihugu. Umushikiranganji w'ukwunguruza abantu n'ibintu, Mutotwe Kafwaya, yasavye abadereva basanzwe bari muri Afrika y'Epfo ko bobika amamodoka yabo ahantu hatekanye gushika umutekano ugarutse. Ivyo bitero ku banyamahanga vyasubiye kwiyongera vyatumye amaduka y'abanyamahanga asahurwa urukombamazi, amamodoka araturirwa, eka n'amakamyo yagendeshwa n'abanyamahanga araterwa. Eka n'ishirahamwe rijejwe iterambere rihuza ibihugu vyo mu karere ka Afrika y'Ubumanuko, SADC, ririyamiriza ivyo bitero. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'iryo shirahamwe,  Stergomena Tax, avuga ko SADC iteye ivyatsi ubwo bukozi bw'ikibi butagira izina bukorerwa abanyamahanga muri Afrika y'Epfo, agasaba ko ico kibazo cotorerwa inyishu irama.

headline: Novak Djokovic: Singwanya kwicandagisha ariko nemeye guheba ibikombe haguhatirwa kwiteza urucanco
text: Novak Djokovic  avuga ko yopfuma aheba gukinira ibikombe vyo muri kazoza haguhatirwa kwiteza urucanco rwa Covid -19. Mu kiganiro cihariye na BBC, yavuze ko ataho ahuriye n'abagwanya incanco, ariko ko ashigikiye uburenganzira bw'umuntu bwo guhitamwo ico ashaka. Djokovic yabajijwe niba yohitamwo guheba amahiganwa nka Wimbledon na French Open haguheba aho  ahagaze ku vyerekeye incanco. Nawe ati : "Ego, ico nico kiguzi niteguriye kuriha." Uwo mukinyi amaze gutsinda Grand Slam incuro 20 yarirukanywe muri Australia mu kwezi guheze reta y'ico gihugu imaze gufuta  visa yiwe ku mpari zijanye no kuba aticandagishije. Djokovic, asanzwe ariwe wa mbere kw'isi  muri tennis y'abagabo, avuga ko yari yarasonse uruhusha rudasansazwe rwo kwinjira muri ico gihugu gukina mw'ihiganwa rya Australian Open kubera yari amaze iminsi aheruka gukira Covid-19. Ariko umushikiranganji wa Australia ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira , Alex Hawke, ubwiwe yaciye afuta visa y'uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 34, ku mvo z'uko kuba ari muri Australia vyari gushobora "kugumura" bigaha intege  agatima ko kugwanya incanco. Yabwiye BBC ati "Sinigeze ngwanya incanco", yemeza ko yatewe incanco akiri umwana, "ariko namye nshigikira uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ico ushira mu mubiri wawe." Mu kiganiro caciye irya n'ino ibibazo vyinshi, ica mbere kuva apfungiwe i Melbourne muri Nzero (ukwa 1), Djokovic yisiguye ku bijanyue n'igihe yatorwa ko yanduye umugera wa corona muri Kigarama (ukwa 12) hamwe n'ingene abona incanco. Djokovic  yavuze ko yizeye ko ingingo zijanye n'ukwicandagisha ku mahiganwa amwe amwe zizohinduka,  anavuga ko yizeye ko "ashobora kuzokina iyindi myaka myinshi". Ariko yanemeje kandi ko yiteguriye guheba amahirwe yo kuba umugabo wa mbere w'ibihe vyose muri tennis kubera uko yumva ibintu. Umukeba wa Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, amaze gutahukana intsinzi 21 za Grand Slam, gutyo akaba ariwe mugabo wa mbere afise intsinzi nyinshi za wenyene kurusha abandi bose. Abajijwe igituma, yishuye ati: "Kubera ica ngenderwako mu gufata ingingo ku vyerekeye umubiri wanje kirakomeye kuruta igikombe canke ikindi kintu ico arico cose. Jewe ngerageza gukurikiza ivyo umubiri wanje ushaka uko bishoboka kwose." Djokovic  yavuze ko yamye ari umuntu ashira imbere "kumererwa neza, amagara, kurya neza," kandi ko ingingo yiwe ku ruhande rumwe yatumwe n'ingaruka nziza ibintu bimwe bimwe nko guhindura ingene arya n'ingene aryama, vyagize ku bushobozi bwiwe nk'umunonotsi. Avuga ko aguma "ari maso" ku bijanye no gushobora kuzokwicandagisha muri kazoza "kuko  turiko turagerageza gutora, twese hamwe, inyishu nziza ishoboka yo kurangiza Covid". "Sinigeze ngwanya kwicandagisha. Ndatahura ko, kw'isi yose, abantu bose bariko baragerageza gushira inguvu mu kurwanya uwo mugera, kandi bizeye ko ugiye kurangira vuba." Umwihwezo w'umunyamakuru Fergus Walsh Incanco (doses) zirenga  miriyaridi 10 za Covid ziramaze guterwa kandi abantu hafi batandatu kuri 10 kw'isi yose baramaze kuronka nibura rumwe. N'ukuvuga ko hari amakuru menshi. Nko ku yindi miti myinshi, incanco za Covid zirashobora kugira ingaruka, ariko integuro yazo ku mutekano ni nziza cane. Zimaze gukiza ubuzima bw'abantu badaharurwa, zakingiye abantu kurwara bakaremba, kandi zishobora kubuza kurwara Covid igihe kirekire. Izi ncanco zakozwe mu mwanya muto cane, ubundi gukora urucanco bikunze guteba kubera ibibazo vyo kuronka uburyo. Abahinga bagize uruhara mu kugerageza incanco za Covid, hamwe n'inzego zijejwe  kuzemeza, bavuga ko ataco birengangije mu bijanye n'umutekano wazo. Hari ingaruka zishika gake cane zibonekeje hagitangura gutangwa izo ncanco ku bantu ama miriyoni, ari naco gituma abagenzura bama bariko barabikurikirana indwi ku ndwi. Biragoye kumenya ibindi Djokovic akeneye canke yifuza kumenya.  Avuga ko adafise amakuru akwiye ku "rucanco" nk'uko umenga hari rumwe gusa. Hari nyinshi.  Nk'umunonotsi,  ivyago vyo kurwara Covid ni bike. Ariko ntibingana n'ubusa. Kanatsinda amaze kuyirwara kabiri. Uruhusha rudasanzwe rwo kwemererwa kwinjira muri Australia kandi aticandagishije rwasabwe hatavuzwe uwurusavye uwari we, kandi rwemewe n'imigwi y'inzego zibiri zigenga zo muri Australia. Ariko hari n'urundi rupapuro rw'urugendo, rwagiyemwo ikosa. Djokovic aremera ko "vy'ukuri, iryo kosa ku rupapuro rwo gusaba visa ntiryakozwe ibigarankana." "Ryaremewe kandi riremezwa na sentare y'igihugu mbere n'umushikiranganji ubwiwe mu bushikiranganji bw'abinjira n'abasohoka muri Australia. "Ico abantu bashobora kuba batazi ni uko  ntirukanywe muri Australia ku mvo z'uko ntari naracandazwe, canke ko hari amategeko narenze canke ko nagize ikosa mu kwuzuza urupapuro rwo gusaba visa. Ivyo vyose vyaremejwe na sentare y'igihugu n'ubushikiranganji bw'abasohoka n'abinjira. "Igituma nirukanywe muri Australia n'uko umushikiranganji ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira yakoresheje ububasha bwiwe mu gufuta visa yanje agendeye ku kwibaza ko nshobora guha intege abafise agatima ko kurwanya incanco mu gihugu canke mu gisagara, ivyo navyo nkaba ntavyemera na gato."

headline: BAL2022: Umugwi New Star usaba urundi rukino inyuma yo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa
text: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaboko Basketball mu Burundi FEBABU ryandikiye ishirahamwe ry'isi yose ry'urwo rukino FIBA risaba ko umugwi wa New Star urenganurwa ku ngingo wafatiwe zo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa kubera Covid. Umugwi wa New Star wahagaritswe mw'ihiganwa inyuma yo gusanga abakinyi bane b'uwo mugwi n'ababaherekeje babiri bafise umugera wa Covid-19. Mu rwandiko rwa FIBA ruvuga ko uwabanduje ari umukinyi yitwa Brian Kavakure. FIBA ikavuga ko, hishimikijwe amategeko y'iryo shirahamwe, abakinyi bose bategerezwa guca bashirwa mu kibanza ca bonyene. Banditse kandi ko "kubera abanduye bashobora kwanduza abandi ku kibuga, hafashwe ingingo ko umugwi wa New Star wirukanywe mw'ihiganwa." Urukino rwategerezwa guhuza New Star na Cape Town Tigers rwaciye rufutwa, New Star ica itsindwa impaga. Baba abarongozi b'umugwi wa New Star canke ba FEBABU ishavu riraniga, bavuga ko barenganijwe. Bagiriza umugwi wa Afrika y'Epfo, Cape Town Tigers, wari watsinzwe na New Star mu rukino rwa mbere ko ari wo woba uri inyuma y'uko kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa. New Star ntihakana ko ari abakinyi bayo basanganywe Covid ariko bagatangazwa n'uko umugwi wa Cape Town Tigers na wo wasanganywe umukinyi afise uwo mugera ata ngingo n'imwe wafatiwe. Aho ni mu gihe ari wo bategerezwa gutana mu mitwe. FEBABU iranibaza iti: "Bigenda gute ngo FIBA ivuge ko umukinyi wacu Brian Kavakure ari we yanduje abandi ariko akaba ata Covid bamusanganye, mbere akanahabwa n'uburenganzira bwo gutahana n'abandi mu Burundi?" Ikindi ishirahamwe rya Basketball mu Burundi rivuga n'ingene umugwi bari baraye bakinye na New Star wa Cobra Sport bawuretse urabandanya ihiganwa. New Star kandi, n'aho yari ibuze abakinyi bakomakomeye, yaratonze ku kibuga kugira bakine na Cape Town Tigers, ariko abo na bo ntibitaba. Ivyo ngo bikagaragara ko ari ivyari vyateguwe ko babakubita impaga babagiriza ko bamwe muri bo batowe Covid. Kubera izo mvo zose, FEBABU isaba ko New star yobandanya ihiganwa hisunzwe amanota iyo migwi ibiri yari imaze kuronka, canke hatunganywe urundi rukino rwobahuriza ku kindi kibuga.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Diaz, Ronaldo, Longstaff, Origi, Cantwell, Coutinho, Traore
text: Liverpool iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano yo kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Porto, umunya Colombia  Luis Diaz, 24, ku miriyoni zirenga 81 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Umusatirizi w'umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo, 36, ashobora kuva muri Manchester United mu ci riza mu gihe atokwishimira umumenyereza uyu murwi uzohitamwo burundu. (Star) Manchester United yemereye umukinyi wayo wo hagati Paul Pogba amasezerano mashasha y'igihe kirekire - ashobora kumuha umushahara w'ibihumbi birenga amajana 540 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku ndwi - kugira ngo uyu mufaransa w'imyaka 28 ntazohave agenda kuri gusa mu ci riza mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na'uyu murwi azoba arangiye.  (Sun) Newcastle yanse ivyo yemerewe na Everton ku mukinyi Sean Longstaff.  Uyu mwongereza w'imyaka 24 akina hagati azorangiza amasezerano afitaniye n'aba Magpies mu mpera z'iri higanwa ry'uno mwaka, bakaba bizeye ko bazokwumvikana ku masezerano mashasha.  (Shields Gazzette) Newcastle n'uwundi murwi wa Premier League nyene iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Norwich Todd Cantwell, 23. (Sky Sports) Newcastle iripfuza kandi umukinyi w'inyuma wa West Ham umufaransa Issa Diop, 24, kandi iriko irategura imiriyoni zababa 13,5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo batangure urugamba rwo kumugura. (L'Equipe via Hammers News) Umusatiri wa Liverpool umubirigi Divock Origi, 26, hamwe n'umusatirizi wa Bournemouth umwongereza Dominic Solanke, 24, bari mu bakinyi bariko barakurikiranirwa hagufi na  Newcastle mu gihe iriko irondera uwosubirira Callum Wilson yavunitse. (Telegraph - subscription required) Imirwi ibiri yo muri Premier League iriko irarwanira kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona umunya Brésil Philippe Coutinho, 29, akaba yiteze gufata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe kuri uwu wa gatanu.  (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Paris St-Germain Mauricio Pochettino ariteguye kwakira ico bomwemerera cose kugira ngo abe umumenyereza wa Manchester United. (Sun) Tottenham iriteguye gusubira gutangura urugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Wolves umunya-Espagne Adama Traore, 25. (Athletic - subscription required) Chelsea nta mugambi ifise wo gutanga amafaranga akenewe kugira ngo igumye burundu umukinyi wo hagati yatijijwe ava muri Atletico Madrid Saul Niguez, 27.  (Express) Manchester United ifise amahirwe make yo kugura umukinyi n'umwe muri kuno kwezi ariko ifise umugambi wo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati mu ci riza, igashobora kuzorondera Declan Rice, 22, wa West Ham.  (Talksport) Arsenal yemeye kuzotanga umukinyi azokwiyongera ku mafaranga yemeye gutanga kugira ngo ironke umusatirizi wa Fiorentina umunya-Serbia Dusan Vlahovic, 21. (Ben Jacobs - CBS) Watford yemeye kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool umwongereza Nathaniel Phillips, 24, yamaze kubwirwa ko afise uburenganzira bwo gusezera uyu murwi muri uku kwezi.  (Football Insider) Aba ba Hornets kandi bamenyesheje umukinyi wabo w'inyuma w'umwongereza Danny Rose, 31, ko atazosubira gukinira uyu murwi kandi ko afise uburenganzira bwo kwigira muri kano kadirisha k'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi. (Sky Sports) Leicester City n'iyindi mirwi itari mike ya Premier League izotegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni zababa 45 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika nimba ishaka kugura umusatirizi wa Club Bruges, Charles de Ketelaere, ariko yipfuza cane kwimukira muri Premier League muri uku kwa mbere. (Voetbal Nieuws - via Leicester Mercury) Barcelona iriko iraraba ko yotira umusatirizi wa Manchester United umufaransa Anthony Martial, 26, harimwo n'umugambi wo kuzoshobora kumugura burundu mu mpera z'iri higanwa.  (Sport - in Spanish) Newcastle nayo nyene iripfuza gutira Martial kugira ngo ashobore gusubirira umusatirizi Callum Wilson yavunitse. (Times - subscription required) Barca kandi iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea umunya Danemark Andreas Christensen, 25. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Everton na Newcastle yahambije Arsenal mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya Brésil Bruno Guimaraes, 24, asanzwe akina hagati muri Lyon mu Bufaransa.  (Standard) Umunyegori wa Liverpool  Loris Karius, 28, vyanse ko yimukira muri Greuther Furth, inyuma y'aho uyu murwi wa Bundesliga mu Budagi unaniriwe no kuronka amafaranga asabwa kugira ngo imukure i  Anfield. (Fussball Transfers via Daily Star) Umusatirizi wa Jamaica Michail Antonio, 31, yateye igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri  West Ham azomushikana mu ci rya 2025. (90 Min)

headline: Mboma na Masilingi bo muri Namibia bompi ntawuzokwiruka 400m muri olympic kubera testosterone nyinshi
text: Umukobwa w'umuyabaga wo muri Namibia  Christine Mboma - yaciye umuhingo wa metero 400 wari umaze imyaka 30 - mu batarenza imyaka 20 ku wa gatatu - yavuye mu bazohiganwa kuri uwo mwanya mu nkino za olympic za Tokyo kuko basanze umubiri wiwe ufise inkabuzo/umusemburo kamere wa testosterone uri ku rugero rurenze urwemerwa n'urwego ruraba izo nkino kw'isi,  World Athletics. Umwanya wari wagizwe n'uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 18 Mboma ku wa gatatu mu gisagara co muri Pologne ca  Bydgoszcz waza ubigira ndwi mu myanya mito ku 400m wirutswe n'umugore gushika ubu - ukaba wamuha amahirwe yo kuronka umudari w'inzahabu kuri izo metero i Tokyo. Ariko komite ya olympic ya Namibia (NNOC - CGA) yemeje ko abo bakobwa bompi batazoshobora guhiganwa kuri izo metero kubera amategeko ya  World Athletics ku bagore bari mu mugwi w'abafise  "Differences of Sexual Development", canke DSD, inyuma yo gupimwa n'urwo rwego. NNOC -CGA yavuze mw'itangazo ko  "bikenewe cane ko abantu bumva ko abo banonotsi bompi atawari azi ko afise ico kibazo. Nta n'uwo mu muryango yari abizi, naho n'umumenyereza wabo canke NNOC -CGA." Mboma yari amaze umwaka atera imbere bigaragara, agumya asumvya aho yari amaze kugera, anaca imihigo mu gihugu,  ku mugabane mbere no kw'isi ku metero 400. Umwanya wiwe w'amasekunda 48.54 -hafi ica cenda kuri cumi (9/10) wihuse kurusha umwanya wa mbere  mwiza wari uhari gushika ubu wagizwe n'umudagikazi wo mu buseruko  Gritt Breur mu 1991 - wari muto cane ku buryo ubwo nyene yaciye aba umwe mu bohiganiwe umudari w'inzahabu na cane ko muri iyo ndwi uwundi mukeba kuri izo metero, Salwa Eid Naser wo muri Bahrain, yari yafatiwe ibihano vy'imyaka ibiri kubera kurenga ku mategeko yo gufata imiti yongereza inguvu zo kwiruka. Ariko uko gutera imbere cane kwatumye World Athletics imukurikiranira hafi, ica isaba ko hasuzumwa  ibipimo vya mbere vyari vyakorewe muri Namibia. Ibindi bipimo vyaciye bikorwa mur iyi ndwi aho bompi Mboma na Masilingi bagirira imyimenyerero ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubutariano Roma, ''inyishu ikaba yaje ivuga ko abo banonotsi bompi umubiri wabo usanzwe ufise inkabuzo kamere za testosterone zirenze urugero". Itangazo ry'urwego rwa Namibia rujejwe inkino za olympic rivuga ko "NNOC -CGA n'umuganga wacu aguma avugana n'umuganga wa World Athletics ku vyerekeye ibigiye gukurikira kuri abo banonostsi babiri." "Tuzokwihweza inkuru zose. Turizeye kazoza kabo nk'abanonostsi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru. Christine na Beatrice bompi bazoshobora guhiganwa ku metero 100 na 200. "Umumenyereza ariteguye kubandanya akorana n'abo bakobwa kuri izo metero mu gihe tukiraba ikigiye gukurikira." Mboma na Masilingi bompi bazohiganwa ubwa mbere mu nkino za olympic i Tokyo mu Buyapani, aho izo nkino zitegekanijwe hagati y'itariki 23 ukwezi kw'indwi n'itari 8 ukwezi kw'umunani. World Athletics irabuza abagore bari mu mugwi wa DSD guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya metero 400 na mile imwe (1,6km) mu mugwi w'abagore kiretse babanje gufata imiti igabanya urugero rw'inkabuzo ya testosterone. Ni co cakuye  umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba, umunya-Afrika y'Epfo Caster Semenya n'umunya-Kenya Margaret  Wambui mw'ihiganwa ku metero 800 mu  nkino za Tokyo. Uko ari batatu nibo bari baronse imidari kuri izo metero mu nkino za Rio mu 2016. Francine Niyonsaba ubu azogeragaza amahirwe yiwe ku metero 5,000 mu gihe  Caster Semenya we vyamunaniye kuronka umwanya usabwa kugira aronke uburenganzira bwo guhiganwa kuri izo metero mu nkino za Tokyo. World Athletics ivuga ko urugero runini rw'iyo nkabuzo rwongereza  kutaruha no gukomera kw'imitsi bigaha amahirwe abafise ururi hejuru cane kurusha abandi. Caster Semenya amaze igihe  yarajanye urubanza muri sentare kugira iyo ngingo ivanweho, ubu akaba arugejeje muri sentare ya Buraya yubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu. Avuga ati: ''Iyo ngingo nta nsiguro igira. Nzoguma ngwanira uburenganzira bwanje."

headline: Icegeranyo kivuga ko Diego Maradona yapfuye kubera ugusamara kw'abaganga
text: Umurwi w'abahinga mu vyo buvuzi wemeje ko uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Argentine mu mupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona "atitaweho kandi habaye urwangara" imbere 'yuko asandaba. Abashikirizamanza muri Argentina bari basavye uyo murwi gukora amatohoza ku bari bajejwe gukurikirana amagara ya Maradona inyuma y'aho apfiriye mu kw'icumi na rimwe umwaka uheze. Maradona yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima muhira iwe i Buenos Aires afise imyaka 60. Mu ntango z'ukwa cumi na rimwe yari yabazwe mu bwonko ikivyimba cari cavuye kw'ivura ry'amaraso, akaba yagomba abandanye avurwa ingaruka z'inzoga. Nk'umwe mu bakinyi babaye rurangiranwa mu bihe vyose, Maradona yahavuye agira ubuzima bubi bwaranzwe no kunywa ibiyayuramutwe n'inzoga nyinshi. Urupfu rwa Maradona yabaye kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina igihe iki gihugu gitahukana igikombe c'isi yose mw'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ry'umupira w'amaguru  mu 1986, rwababaje abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, bakaba bibajije vyinshi ku bijanye n'abari bajejwe kumuvura. Haciye imisi mike apfuye, abashikirizamanza baciye batangura amatohoza ku baganga n'abaforoma bari bajejwe kumuvura. Mu kwa gatatu, abo bashikirizamanza batumyeko abahinga 20 muvyo ubuvuzi  kugira ngo bihweze icatumye Maradona apfa bongere bihweze nimba harabaye urwangara. Ivyavuye mu matohoza y'abo bahinga vyatangajwe n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri Argentina ku wa gatanu. Mu cegeranyo c'impapuro 70, uyo murwi werekana ko Maradona yasinzikaye cane hafi amasaha 12 imbere y'uko apfa. Muri iki gihe, "ntiyakurikiranywe bikwiye", nk'uko iki cegeranyo kibivuga. Gisubiramwo ibiri muri ico cegeranyo, ikinyamakuru Clarin co muri Argentina kivuga ko uyo murwi wagiriza abaganga bari bajejwe kuvura Maradona "bamutanye wenyene" Abo bahinga bavuga ko Maradona yari gushobora kuronka amahirwe yo gukira iyo ajanwa kuvurirwa kw'ivuriro hakumugumiza muhira, nk'uko ico kinyamakuru kibivuga. Uyo murwi uvuga ko abari bajejwe kuvura Maradona batamuvuye neza kandi baranzwe n'urwangara, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters naryo ryaronse ico cegeranyo. Umuganga bwite wa Maradona Leopoldo Luque w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'uwari ajejwe gukurikirana ubuzima bwiwe bwo mu mutwe, bari mu baganga bariko barakorwako amatohoza n'aho bashikirizamanza. Umurwi w'abahinga washikirije icegeranyo cawo, hasigaye ko abashikirizamanza bafata ingingo ku bijanye no kurengutsa abagirizwa. Ikinyamakuru Clarin kivuga ko bimwe muvyo bashobora kwagirizwa harimwo ubwicanyi. Uru rupfu rwakozweko amatohoza inyuma y'uko babiri mu bakobwa ba Maradona bitwaye. Bavuze ko bagize amakenga ku kungene se wabo yakurikiranywe amaze kubagwa mu bwonko. Muganga Luque wewe nta caha camwagiriye. Arahakana ko ataruhara yabigizemwo. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abanyamakuru akorora amosozi mu kwa cumi na rimwe, Muganga Luque yararize, avuga ko yakoze uko ashoboye kugira arokore ubuzima bw'umugenzi wiwe. Uyu muganga yavuze ko yakoze "ivyo yari ashoboye vyose gushika aho ananirwa".

headline: Lionel Messi: Barça yipfuza kunagura umurwi ishingiye ku mukinyi wa mbere kw'isi
text: Barcelona iracipfuza ko yosubira kwiyubaka ishingiye kuri kizigenza wayo Lionel Messi, ubu abarongoye uyu murwi bakaba bariko baragerageza kumwumvisha ko yowugumamwo, nk'uko bivugwa na Ramon Planes ajejwe kwinonora imitsi muri Barça. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 33 akomoka muri Argentine yaratangarije uyu murwi ko yipfuza kuwusezerera. Uyu mukinyi amaze gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu incuro indwi zose niwe mukinyi wa mbere amaze gutsindira Barcelona ibitsindo vyinshi, bingana na 634. Planes ati: "Ivyabaye vyarabaye kandi intumbero yacu ni ukunagurira umurwi wacu ku mushinge w'umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi". "Dushaka kwubaka uwundi murwi utsinda urongowe n'umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi, uwa mbere mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi". "Barça na Leo ni nk'umugabo n'umugore, aho uruhande rumwe rwitangiye cane urundi, kandi bompi banezereje abakunzi. Nibaza ko kazoza ari keza. Ndafise viyizigiro". Messi - umukinyi amaze imyaka yose akina muri Barça - yipfuza kuja ahandi inyuma y'uko umwaka wose w'inkino urangiye ata gikombe na kimwe baronse, akamaramaza kakaba kabaye mu rukino rw'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma ca Champions League rwagiye kurangira Bayern Munich yirahiye Barça ibitsindo 8-2. Amasezerano ya Messi na Barcelona azorangira mu 202, ariko umurwi umukeneye ukaba utegerezwa kumugura ku miliyoni 700. Planes ati: "Turakeneye abakinyi b'inararibonye nka Leo Messi, ariko kandi n'abakinyi b'integabizoza ku murwi. Turiko turita ku rutare kugira ngo imigenderanire hagati ya Messi na Barça ibandanye. Turiko turakora kugira ngo twumvishe Leo". "Barça yagiye yiyubaka incuro nyinshi muri kahise kandi yamye yivyukiranya ikaza ikomeye cane, rero muri kino gihe nivyo turimwo". Bamwe babona ko kugira ngo Messi ashobore kugondozwa ari uko umukuru wayo Josep Maria Bartomeu atanga imihoho, maze hakaba ayandi matora. Hagati aho, iki conyene gishobora kudatuma uyu murwi ugumana uyu mukinyi amaze gutsindira ihiganwa rya Espanye incuro cumi zose hamwe n'ihiganwa rya Bulaya (Champions League) incuro zine.

headline: Caster Semenya yise abarongozi ba 'athletisme' muri Africa ba 'niryo' ku ngingo ya sentare ya siporo.
text: Uwigeze gutwara umudari wa olempike incuro zibiri n'uwo ihiganwa ry'isi yose incuro zitatu, Caster Semenya, yise abategetsi ba Afrika muvyo kwinonora imitsi, ba "niryo" kuba barananiwe guhagarara bakagwanira abanonotsi b'abapfasoni bahanganye n'ikibazo co gukurwa mu mahiganwa. Uwo munonotsi w'imyaka 31  yarakuwe ku rutonde rw'abahiganwa ku metero akunda gusiganwako 800 hisunzwe amategeko  agenga inkabuzo ya "testostérone" umuntu aba afise mu mubiri, y'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryo kwinonora imitsi mu 2019. Abanonotsi bafise inkabuzo nyinshi za "testostérone" basabwa gukoresha umuti mu kuzigabanya kugira bashobore guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1500. Semenya yagize ati: "Nibaza ko, kuri uyu musi, dufise abategetsi ba 'niryo'". "Kuri uyu mugabane, abantu baranumye. Sintahura igituma batavuga. Ntibagwanira abanonotsi babo. "Mutegerezwa guseruka mugakora, mukagwanira abanonotsi banyu, gutyo abanonotsi ba Afrika bazoba beza cane. Ubu uko bimeze birababaje." Igihe BBC Sport Africa yabaza Maboum Kalkaba, prezida w'urunani rw'amashirahamwe yo kwinonora imitsi muri Afrika (CAA), ivyerekeye ivyo Semanya avuga, n'uko abategetsi barongoye ishirahamwe ryo kwinonora imitsi muri Afrika bakoreye ibikwiye abo barongoye, yishuye ati: "Nimundeke, nta nyishu mfise". Abanonotsi benshi bo muri Afrika barakozweko n'iyo ngingo, harimwo umunonotsi w'umurundikazi yatahukanye umudari w'ifeza mu nkino za olempike, Francine Niyonsaba, hamwe na mugenzi we wo muri Kenya bahiganwa ku metero 800. Mu mwaka uheze, abayabaga babiri bo muri Namibia, Christine Mboma na Beatrice Masilingi, barahatiwe kuva mw'ihiganwa rya metero 400, imbere y'imisi mike ngo habe inkino za olempike za Tokyo inyuma yo kumenyeshwa ko bafise urugero runini rw'inkabuzo za testostérone. Bompi Mboma na Masilingi batinze bahiganwa mu metero 200 mu Buyapani, aho Mboma yatahukanye umudari w'ifeza wa mbere wa olempike w'ico gihugu. Ariko Semenya, ubu ahiganwa ku metero 5000, yaranebaguye ingene abategetsi b'ishirahamwe rya Afrika riraba abanonotsi bitwaye kuri ico kibazo c'abo bayabaga co kimwe n'"agacerere" ku ngingo yafashwe yo kubabuza guhiganwa muri rusangi. Uwo munye Afrika y'epfo yagize ati: "Igihe nari mfise imyaka 18, sinashobora kuvuga. Ubu ndakuze bikwiye, ndashobora kuvuga. "Nimwiyumvire ivyaciye mu mitwe y'iyo miyabaga. Nta co bashobora gukora, ariko abategetsi bariyicariye gusa binezerererwa gusa n'uturusho bafise, mu bibanza biberamwo amanama. Umuyobozi mukuru wa CAA, Lamine Faty yavuze ko Semenya "afise uburenganzira bwo gushikiriza ivyo yiyumvira" kandi ko ibibazo ku ngingo zatumye bakurwa mw'ihiganwa vyashikirijwe n'iryo shirahamwe "kera cane" kandi ko vyaganiriweko mu misi ya vuba mu kanama ka CAA  mu nama yabereye muri Ile Maurice. Impari kw'itorwa ry'abagore bagira uruhara muri siporo zabaye nyinhsi, na cane cane zikaba zashimikiye ku banonotsi bameze nk'abagabo kandi ari abakobwa. Mu ndwi iheze, prezida w'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryo kwinonora imitsi, Seb Coe, yavuze ko iryo shirahamwe rishobora gukurikizako igisata co kwoga, mu kubuza abagore biyumva nk'abagabo kuja mw'ihiganwa, avuga ashimitse ko "kutarenganya bidashobora guharirwako". Yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Tubandanya twiga, tugira ubushakashatsi ku bwinshi bw'inkabuzo ya testostérone ko ari kimwe mu bituma umuntu akomera gusumba , tukaba twarategekanije ibiganiro ku mategeko yacu mu kanama kacu mu mpera y'umwaka." Semenya, yatwaye umudari w'inzahabu ku metero 800 mu myaka ya 2012 na 2016 mu nkino za olempike, yari yunguruje ku ngingo zafashwe n'ishirahamwe ry'abanonotsi kw'isi, ariko aratsindwa muri sentare ica imanza z'inkino mu 2019. Yaratsinzwe kandi muri sentare y'iyungururizo no muri sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise mu mwaka wakurikiye, imbere yo kwitura sentare ya Buraya ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu aho urwo rubanza rutarumvirizwa. Yagize ati: "Ntituzigera duhagarika uru rugamba." "Ubu ibi ntibiraba jewe gusa, biraba abana bakiri bato ubu bariko baravuka bazohangana n'iki kibazo. "Hari abana benshi bipfuza guhiganwa ku metero 400, 800 na 1500, ariko ntibashobora kubemerera. Bavuga ko siporo ari iya bose, ariko ubu si iya bose."

headline: CAN 1996: Intsinzi ya South Afrika n'uruhara yagize mu mpinduka z'inyuma ya apartheid
text: Ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika ryo mu 1996 ntiryari ryitezwe kubera muri Afrika y'Epfo. Kenya nico gihugu cari catowe ko cari kuritegura, ariko hasigaye amezi 14 yarakuyemwo akarenge, ivuga ko vyari kuyisaba uburyo busumba incuro zitandatu ubwari bwitezwe. Niho mu kwa cumi na rimwe 1994, ishirahamwe rya Afrika rijejwe umupira w'amaguru (CAF) ryaca rirondera ahandi iri higanwa ryari kubera. Mu ntango z'uwo mwaka, mu kwa kane, Nelson Mandela yari yatowe nk'umukuru w'igihugu mu matora ya mbere ya demokarasi muri kahise ka Afrika y'Epfo. Niho umurwi nserukiragihugu wari ucemererwa kwinjira mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu, usubijwe mu rwego mpuzamashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, FIFA, inyuma y'aho hashingiwe ishirahamwe rishasha ry'umupira w'amaguru (FA) ry'ico gihugu rihurikiyemwo amoko atandukanye mu 1991, igihe bwa butegetsi mvanguramoko bwa apartheid bwari butanguye gusenyuka. Afrika y'Epfo niyo yatowe ngo itunganye iri higanwa. Ariko nta muntu yari yiteze ko bari kubishobora. Mu vy'ukuri, ibintu ntivyagenze neza mu ntango inyuma y'aho basubirijwe mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu mu 1991 gushika n'aho umunyamabanga mukuru wa FA Solomon Morewa yihaye iryosozi. Iri higanwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika (CAN/AFCON) ryagiye kuba ikindi kintu. Ivyabaye mu myaka ya 1990 bigahindura ibintu, maze bigasambura ubutegetsi bw'abazungu muri Afrika y'Epfo bwari bumaze ibinjana birenga bitatu, navyo vyarahinduye urwego rw'umupira w'amaguru wariko urakomera mu buryo budasubira inyuma. Hari ikintu kidasanzwe cari giherutse kuba muri ico gihugu, iki naco ni ugutsindira igikombe c'isi yose mu rukino rwa Rugby (Rugby World Cup) mu buryo butangaje mu 1995. Ariko, nk'uko bivugwa n'abaserukiye iki gihugu cari kivutse bushasha mu kwinjira mu ntwaro rusangi mu nkino za CAN 1996 catsindiye, iyi ntsinzi yagize ingaruka zikomeye gusumba. Cameroun niyo yahuye ubwa mbere na Afrika y'Epfo. Ku wa 13 Nzero/Mutarama, imirwi nserukirabihugu yavyo yaratanye mu mitwe ku kibuga Soccer City, hanze gato y'igisagara ca Soweto, hamwe habera ya myiyerekano y'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyeshure biyamiriza intwaro y'inkehwa z'abazungu, aho abaharurwa mu majana bagandaguwe n'igipolisi cariko kirwanya iyi myiyerekano, imyaka 20 yari iheze. Neil Tovey yari afise imyaka 33.  Uyu mukinyi w'inyuma yakinira umurwi wo muri ico gihugu Kaizer Chiefs, yatanguye gukina ku rwego mpuzamakungu mu kw'indwi 1992, inyuma y'isabukuru yiwe y'imyaka 30 y'amavuka. Uru ni rwo rwabaye urukino rwiwe rwa mbere mu murwi nserukiragihugu uhuriyemwo koko amoko menshi - rwawuhuje kandi na Cameroun ruza kurangira bayitsinze 1-0. Tovey yabwiye BBC ati: "Imbere y'iri higanwa, iyo ubaza abagize umurwi mbere na jewe nimba twari gushobora kuritsindira, sinzi nimba twari kwishura ko twari kubishobora". "Baba abafana, baba twebwe abakinyi, nta na bamwe bari bamenyereye amahiganwa mpuzamakungu y'umupira w'amaguru. Ariko uko ihiganwa ryagiye ritera imbere, niko igihugu cagiye gikomera". Umusi umwe imbere y'uko urukino rwa mbere rutangura, Perezida Mandela, kw'izina kama ryiwe nka Madiba, yaragendeye ubwa mbere uyu murwi mu ngendo zitari nke yagize muri uyu murwi. Lucas Radebe, ico gihe yakinira Leeds United, ni uwundi mukinyi yari mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Afrika y'Epfo. Ku bwiwe, kubonana na Mandela casa n'uko coba ari igikorwa c'Imana. Ati: "Igihe twari tugikura, ntitwigeze tumenya ngo yasa gute". "Twari dufise isanamu yiwe ya kera yamwerekana akiri muto, ariko igihe aza kuturaba aho twari turi mw'ikambi, aha niho twabonye  "Madiba Magic". Yari afise igihagararo kidasanzwe. Twarabuze ico tuvuga". "Uwo musi, n'iyo tugahura na Brésil twari kuyikubita. Uko rero niko twatewe intege. Umuzo wiwe wadushikanye ku rugero rwo hejuru cane, aho urukino rwose twakina, twabona ko turiko dukinira Madiba na Afrika y'Epfo". 'Madiba Magic' cari iciyumviro cari mu mitwe y'abantu ko Mandela yatera imigisha ku mirwi y'umupira w'amaguru. Ni iciyumviro cavutse ku wa 10 Rusama/Gicurasi 1994 - umusi Mandela yimikwa - ico gihe Afrika y'Epfo ikaba yatsinze Zambia ku ncuro ya mbere, umukuru w'igihugu mushasha ari ho ari. Vyasa n'uko iki ciyumviro cariko kirakora kandi. Cameroun yatsinzwe 3-0, iki kikaba cabaye ikimenyetso c'ivyari bigiye gukurikira. Umukinyi Phil Masinga wa Leeds niwe yateye ica mbere amaze amasaha 24 gusa avuye mu Bwongereza. Nk'uko bivugwa na Shaun Bartlett yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Charlton, igihe Afrika y'Epfo ifata ikibanza ca mbere mu murwi yarimwo maze ikinjira mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, umurwi waciye umenyekana kw'izina rya Madiba's Boys (Abahungu ba Madiba). Ati: "Gushika n'ubu, kuvuga gusa izina ry'igihangange Mandela nca numva merereje. Igihe cose twabonanye na we, agukoze mu miwe gusa, wamengo hari ikintu aguhaye. "Ikintu kibi conyene gusa ni uko wategerezwa kuvyuka isaha cumi n'igice mu gatondo, kubera ni vyo bihe yari akirimwo vyo kuva igihe yinjira ibohero. Yavyuka mu gaturuturu agatembera. Rero twategerezwa kuvyuka kugira tubonane na we isaha cumi n'imwe z'agatondo". Ariko Afrika ntiyatsindiye iri higanwa rya Afrika ku kigumbagumba gusa, canke kumbure kubera yari ifise izindi nguvu ikuye ku yindi si. Umupira bari bawuzi, kandi bari bafise umumenyereza mwiza Clive Barker. Tovey, umukinyi yinjirije igihugu ciwe ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi mu nkino 29, avuga ati: "Yarabonye ubuhinga muri buri mukinyi wese aca arabukorerako mu kubagira abakinyi bakomeye abagira ico babaye". Imbere y'uko baja mw'ihiganwa, bari bamaze gukina inkino 13 badatsindwa, muri zo harimwo zibiri banganije n'Ubudagi hamwe na Argentina. Iciyongereye kuri izi nguvu, ni ubuhinga bw'abakinyi Radebe na Phil Masinga bakuye i Bulaya mu murwi wa Leeds, co kimwe n'umusatirizi wa Wolves, Mark Williams. Hariho kandi n'umukinyi w'inyuma Mark Fish yariko arakurikiranirwa hagufi na Manchester United, akaba muri uwo mwaka nyene yategerezwa kuja gukinira Lazio, imbere y'uko yijira muri Bolton mu 1997. Inyuma y'intsinzi idasanzwe y'umurwi wa rugby mu mwaka w'imbere y'aho, itsinzi y'umurwi wari ugizwe ahanini n'abazungu yashize hamwe igihugu, bari baronse ikindi bagenderako. Tovey ati: "Iyi yari imwe mu ntego twavuga". "Twari tuzi ko dufise kandi uruhara mu gusubiza hamwe igihugu, kandi Madiba yari azi ko mu gihe twari kuvyifatamwo neza vyari gutuma ubumwe butsimbatara mu gihugu. "Umunezero waranze intsinzi y'umurwi wa rugby wari 10% gusa w'uwari kubaho mu gihe twari kuramuka natwe dutahukanye intsinzi". Itsinzi itangaje yagize kuri Algeria mu kuyitsinda 2-1 mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, ivuye ku gitsindo ca John 'Shoes' Moshoeu ku munota wa 86, yatumye yinjira mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma aho yahura na Ghana. Iki gihugu nico cahabwa amahirwe, nk'umurwi wa mbere wa Afrika, umurwi umwe rudende utigeze utsindwa na rimwe muri iryo higanwa. Umurwi wa Ghana wari ukomeye cane kuko wari wishimiye umukinyi w'inyuma wa Bayern Munich Samuel Kuffour, umukinyi wo hagati wa Torino Abedi Pele - se wa Andre na Jordan Ayew - hamwe n'uwundi musatirizi wa Leeds yariko araduga cane Tony Yeboah. Ariko aba banya Ghana batashe zirayoye muri uru rukino bakubiswe 3-0. Tovey ati: "Urukino rwa Ghana ni rumwe mu nkino zacu zari zikomeye gushika ubwo". "Harabaye uguhangana bikomeye hagati ya Lucas na Yeboah. Hose mu kibuga, umupira wari rwacu". Amakuru y'intsinzi muri uru rukino yaravuzwe cane mu binymakauru bukeye. Ikinyamakuru Business Day canditse kiti: "Igihe Afrika y'Epfo ikubitiye Ghana, uturere twari twiganjemwo abazungu twaritabiriye umupira w'amaguru ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho mu myaka 20 yose mu gihe c'amahiganwa yaba ay'igihugu canke aya Afrika". Buca haba urukino rwa nyuma, umutwe w'inkuru nyamukuru y'ikinyamakuru gikuru Beeld casohoka buri musi mu rurimi rw'iki afrikaans yari yanditswe mu kizulu ngo: 'Yebo Bafana Bafana!' (Yeah, The Boys! twogereranya mu kirundi tuti "Komera mwa bahungu mwe!") Bategerezwa guhura na Tunisia. Isinzi ry'abantu bangana na 80.000, harimwo Perezida Mandela, umwami w'abaZulu Goodwill Zwelithini hamwe n'uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Brésil Pele, bari bakubise harazima mu kibuga ca Soccer City, amasaha atatu imbere y'uko urukino rutangura. Mandela yari yambaye agapira kanditseko inomero 9 yambarwa na Neil Tovey, mu gihe abafana benshi bari biyanditse ku bikiriza vyabo mu marangi atandukanye ubutumwa bwavuga ngo 'Make Madiba Magic'. Mu gice ca mbere c'urukino, uretse umupira watewe mw'igori na Bartlett ariko umunyegori wa Tunisia akawukurayo, umupira ntiwigeze urenga hagati mu kibuga. Ariko, mu vyaboneka ko bananiranywe, hagati mu gice ca kabiri, Williams yari yasubiriye Masinga yerekanye ubudasa. Uyu musatirizi yinjie ibitsindo bibiri mu minota ibiri nyene - ica mbere cari ic'umutwe, ica kabiri kiva mu mupira ukomeye yateresheje ibamfu - maze aha Afrika y'Epfo intsinzi idasanzwe. Ivyakurikiye wabaye umunezero utagira urugero. Radebe ati: "Ndacavyibuka neza nk'uko umengo ni ivyabaye nijoro. Mu gihugu cose nta muntu yakoza ukuguru hasi. "Ico wumva yari Soweto. Nta bantu wumva biruka, kiretse abafana hanze y'ikibuga barira, baboroga. "Igihe twariko tuva mu kibuga, twabona abantu bikubita hasi. Bamwe bari bafise ikirato, abandi nabo bafise ifi ikanura (mu kwigina 'Shoes' Moshoeu na Mark Fish). "Vyari ibintu koko bigoye kwumva. Nibaza ko ryabaye iteka ku gihugu cose". Mw'ijambo yavuze imbere y'uko apfa mu 2015 ku myaka 49 ihitanywe na kanseri yo mu mushishito, Moshoeu yibutse ingene yaturitse akarira igihe umufana w'umuzungu amusavye ko yomuterera igikumu (autograph). Afrika y'Epfo yari ikiri mu bibazo bikomeye cane, inkino zonyene ntizishobora gutorera umuti ibibazo vyose. Ariko Mandela yarizeye ubushobozi bwazo. Ati: "Inkino zirafise ubushobozi bwo guhindura isi. Zifise inguvu zo kwigisha. Zifise ubushobozi bwo gushira hamwe abantu gusumba uko ibindi vyose vyobikora. "Inkino zirafise ubushobozi bwo kuzana icizere ahahoze harangwa umwiheburo. Zisumvya inguvu reta mu gusambura imitego ishingiye ku moko". Radebe yabonye impinduka mu kanya isase. Ati: "Kwumva abazungu bavuga ngo 'uri incungu yanje, ni wewe gusa nibonamwo' vyantumye nkorora amosozi kuko nibuka ivyo twari duhitiyemwo muri iyo myaka yose. Iyi yari yo Afrika y'Epfo nshasha". "Ubwenge bwacu bwarugurutse. Amaso yacu yariko abona ibintu birengeye ivyo twari tumaze imyaka n'imyaka tubona. Vyari koko ibintu biteye igomwe. Kubera gusa umupira w'amaguru". Tovey avuga ko uwu munezero wabandanije gushika ku rugero rurengeye iyi misi yakurikiye yo kwigina intsinzi. "Kuva ubwo abazungu benshi baciye batangura kuja barinjira mu bibuga kurorera inkino z'imirwi ikomakomeye na mpuzamakungu. Abantu b'ingeri zose babandanije badufata mu mugongo uko bukeye uko bwije. "Ivyo twakoreye igihugu vyabaye ibintu bidasanzwe. Abanyagihugu 10% canke 12% bakunda rugby, ariko umupira w'amaguru wakundwa ku rugero rwa 95%. Eka n'abazungu kuva ico gihe baciye bamenya Bafana Bafana. "Ariko uku si ugukengera ivyo abakinyi ba rugby bakoreye igihugu. Ni bo babaye aba mbere kubikora mu 1995, kandi bakoze ibikorwa vyinsha cane bidasanzwe". Iragi umupira w'amaguru wasize ni ingene Afrika y'Epfo yashoboye kuronka itike yo kuja mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru c'isi incuro zibiri yikurikiranya. Mu mahiganwa abiri yakurikiye y'igikombe ca Afrika, Afrika y'Epfo yatahukanye ikibanza ca kabiri n'ica gatatu. Mu bajejwe gufata ingingo, uwari arongoye FIFA ico gihe Joao Havelange yari yemereye Afrika ko ari yo yari gutegura ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi mu 2006. Impera n'imperuka vyahavuye biba mu 2010 muri Afrika y'Epfo. Nayo ku vyerekeye Tovey, Radebe na Bartlett - bazokwama baboneka  nk'intwari ku banyagihugu b'igihugu cabo. Tovey yarahawe agashimwe na Mandela. Avuga ati: "Nk'umukinyi, ukora ivyo utegerezwa gukora. Ariko inyuma y'imyaka 26 ngeze kuri iyi ntambwe, uwu mwanya namaranye nawe wari udasanzwe, udasanzwe na gato". "Amasanamu yiwe mu kabare kanje. Ni ikintu kidashobora kwibagirwa muri kahise k'igihugu. "Ntitwari gupfa dushitse aho twashitse iyo atava mw'ibohero ngo adusubize ku rubuga mpuzamakungu rw'umupira". Kubwa Radebe, iragi riza mu mutwe ningoga ni ihadabu yatangishijwe na muri Leeds. Ati:  "Inyuma ya finale, umumenyereza wa Leeds Howard (Wilkinson) yarampamagaye ambwira ati 'nkeneye kukubona muri irya ndege'. Nshitse i Yorkshire, mu mbeho izura inzara yo mu gihe kibi c'ubukonje. Oh, Mana yanje". "Twategerezwa kuva twashitse bukeye. Naciwe ihadabu y'umushahara w'indwi yose kubera nashitse harenzeko umusi umwe. Maze gushika muri Leeds nkabona ku mboneshakure imodoka itugaye iriko irazunguruka n'igikombe, mvugishije ukuri narababaye cane". "Abakinyi bagiye ku kibuga ca Sun City bari kumwe n'abagore babo hamwe n'abakunzi babo, nanje ndiko ndakina muri Leeds mu mbeho y'ubugesera yo mu kwa kabiri izura inzara, ntivyanyoroheye. "Nari ndindiriye ko ici rishika kugira ngo ihiganwa riheze nanje nshobore kuja muhira nkigina intsinzi". Hagati aho, intsinzi yaronse mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika si yo yabaye iya nyuma yamushize hamwe na Mandela. 'Madiba' yari mu batumire ku bugeni bwiwe. Ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe twigeze tubwira ko yari kuza. Jewe gusa n'umugore wanje ni twe twari tubizi. Nibaza ko nari mfise umunezero gusumba uwo nagize igihe mbwira umugore wanje ko twokwubaka". "Umugore yashitse isaha icenda, ariko Mandela we yari yashitse isaha umunani n'iminota 45 kuko atashaka ko abashitsi bitaho we aho kwitaho umugore wanje. Uyo ni we mugabo, umugabo yama akora ibintu vyose mu bushingatahe, ibi ni vyo bintu bikeya nshobora kugumana mu buzima bwanje. "Aha nta nkeka ko ndamufise mu mafoto. Ntushobora kubwira abantu ngo yaraje ku bugeni bwawe hanyuma ngo ubure ivyemezo".

headline: Igikombe ca Afrika Misiri 2019 - Imigwi, inkino n'uko batsindana
text: Uru ni urutonde rw'imigwi y'amakipe ari mu gikombe ca Afrika Misiri 2019, ugashobora kubona amakipe aza guhura, uko batsindanye hamwe n'ukuntu bahagaze mu manota. Ushobora gukurikirana ngaha umunsi ku munsi ukuntu izi nkino ziriko ziragenda

headline: Mesut Ozil avuga ko azoguma muri Arsenal gushika amasezerano arangiye mu 2021
text: Mesut Ozil, umukinyi wo hagati w'umurwi Arsenal, avuga ko azoguma muri uyo murwi "gushika ku munota wa nyuma" w'amasezerano yiwe ategekanijwe kurangira mu kwa gatandatu 2021. Kuva inkino za Premier League zisubiriye gutangura mu kwa gatandatu, uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 31 ubu - yigeze kuba ari mpuzamakungu w'Ubudagi -  ntiyigeze akinishwa n'umumenyereza Mikel Arteta, avuga ko ari ukubera "ibibazo bijanye n'urukino". Amasezerano afitaniye na Arsenal amuha umushahara w'amapawundi 350.000 ( amadorari y'abanyamerika 458,421) ku ndwi. Ozil yahakanye amakuru avuga ko uyu murwi woba uriko urondera kumwishura umushahara wose w'umwaka umwe asigaje muri ayo masezerano. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Athletic ati: "Nivyo ibintu vyaragoranye ariko ndakunda Arsenal. Nije nzohitamwo igihe nzogira, si abandi bantu bampitiramwo umunsi wo kugenda". Yongerako ati: "Nzokwitangira umurwi uko nshoboye kwose. Ibintu nk'ibi ntaco bizongira, ahubwo bimpa ingoga. Muri kahise narashoboye kwerekana ko nshobora kwivyukiranya kandi nzosubira ndavyerekane". Ozil, umukinyi yinjiye muri Arsenal mu 2013 aguzwe muri Real Madrid ku mapawundi imiliyoni 42.4, yaramaze igihe adakina igihe uyu murwi wamenyerezwa na Unai Emery, mu nyuma arasubira mu kibuga igihe wamenyerezwa vy'imfatakibanza na Freddie Ljungberg. Igihe Arteta afatiye ibintu mu minwe mu kwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze, Ozil yarakinishijwe mu nkino zose cumi za Premier League Arsenal yakinye imbere y'uko iri higanwa rihagarikwa vy'agateganyo mu kiringo c'amezi atatu kubera coronavirus kuva mu kwa gatatu. Hagati aho, mu nkino zose 13 za Arsenal ihiganwa risubiye kwugururwa, Ozil ntiyigeze akinishwa na rimwe. Mu kwa kane Arteta n'abakinyi biwe baremeye ko bakatwa ibice 12.5%, maze Arsenal nayo itangaza ko itegura guhagarika abakozi bayo 55 kubera ibibazo vy'amafaranga vyavuye ku kiza karanda ca coronavirus. Hagati aho, Ozil wewe ntiyemeye ko umushahara wiwe ugabanywa, akavuga ko abakinyi "bafashwe gihutihuti". Amenyesha ko iyo ngingo ishobora kuba ari yo yatumye ataronswa amahirwe yo kwinjira mu kibuga. N'aho yubaha ingingo ya Arteta yo kutamukinisha, Ozil abona ko yari kuba yarahawe akaryo ko kwerekana ivyo ashoboye mu kibuga. Ati: "Urashobora kudakina mu nkino cumi zose zikurikirana kubera urwaye, ariko atari kubera ko utabishoboye canke kubera ufise ingeso mbi". Avuga kandi ko atari we wenyene yanse gukatwa umushahara, ariko ko izina ryiwe ari ryo ryabonetse gusumba.

headline: Euro 2020 - France 1-0 Germany: Benshi barakomeretse mu myiyerekano y'uwakoroka mu mutaka
text: Abantu batari bake bari mu bitaro aho bariko baravurwa inyuma y'aho bakomerekejwe n'umugabo yariko akora imyiyerekano agendera mu mutaka hanyuma akorokera mu kibuga, hari imbere y'urukino hagati y'Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi. Ishirahamwe rijejwe umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, UEFA, rivuga ko "abajejwe amategeko bazofata ingingo zikenewe" ku vyo ryise igikorwa "c'ugusamara kandi cateye akaga". Imyanda yaguye mu kibuga igihe uwo mutaka wafatwa n'intsinga zifata kamera yo hejuru. Mu kwururuka, uyu mugabo yituye hasi mu kibuga. Yari afise umutaka wanditseko amajambo ngo "Kick out oil Greenpeace", bikaba vyabaye ngombwa ko abaganga babanza kumusuzuma imbere y'uko abajejwe umutekano bamusohora. Ishirahamwe riharanira ibidukikije Greenpeace rivuga ko ari ryo ryatunganije iki gikorwa. Mw'itangazo ryasohoye rikaba risaba imbabazi abo bose bakomeretse, rikavuga ko "habaye ingorane z'ubuhinga", ivyatumye uyu mugabo akorokera mu kibuga atabishaka. Benjamin Stephan wo mw'ishirahamwe Greenpeace avuga ko intumbero yari iyo "guca hejuru" y'ikibuga hanyuma akarekura umupira w'umuco ufise ubutumwa bwo gusaba ihinguriro ry'Ubudagi rikora imodoka Volkswagen "gusiramwo inguvu igakingira ikirere". Iri tangazo ryongerako y'uko "umutekano ari co kintu kiza imbere ya vyose mu bikorwa vya Greepeace" kandi ko rizoshigikira itohoza iryo ari ryo ryose. Stephan ati: "Turasavye imbabazi n'umutima wacu wose ku bantu bakomeretse, turizeye ko bagiye gukira vuba. Turasavye imbabazi kandi abakinyi n'abarorerezi vyateye ubwoba". " Mw'itangazo, UEFA ivuga ko ivyabaye ari "igikorwa kirimwo ugusamara kandi giteje akaga". Abarongoye UEFA bavuga bati: "Iki gikorwa kitabereye - igikorwa cari gushobora kugira ingaruka zikomeye ku bantu benshi bari bahari - cakomerekeje abantu benshi bitabiriye uru rukino ubu bari mu bitaro kandi abajejwe amategeko bazofata ingingo zikenewe". Ubufaransa bwatsinze uru rukino ku gitsindo kimwe cinjijwe na Mats Hummels w'Ubudagi yiyinjije mu gice ca mbere.

headline: Tokyo 2020: CNO- Burundi ivuga ko Francine Niyonsaba adafashwa kuko hari ivyo atakwije
text: Umunonotsi w'umurundi Francine Niyonsaba aridoga ko komite olempique y'Uburundi (CNO) idafasha abanonotsi kwitegura mu gihe hasigaye indwi zibiri ngo inkino olempique ya Tokyo zitangure. Mu butumwa yashize kuri Facebook, Niyonsaba avuga ati: "Mugabo ntibizontangaza kubona abaherekeza abanonotsi baba benshi kurusha abitanze kugira baserukire igihugu, none bazoba batugiye inyuma gukora iki?" Salvator Bigirimana umunyamabanga mukuru wa CNO wewe avuga ko Niyonsaba adafashwa kubera hari ivyo atujuje imfashanyo yahabwa igahagarikwa, ko abandi bari kwitegura bobo babafasha. Niyonsaba, umurundi wa kabiri mu mateka wahaye igihugu ciwe ikidari olempike mu gusiganwa ku maguru mu bagore, ntiyavuze birambuye ingene we ubwiwe canke abandi banonotsi badafashwa. Bigirimana avuga ko imbere y'amahiganwa olempike hariho imfashanyo abanonotsi baronka ku kwezi ku kwezi mu mezi 18 CNO ikayibaronsa ivuye muri Comité International Olympique, (CIO). Ariko ko iyo mfashanyo idahabwa abagiye mu mahiganwa olempike yabanje canke abamaze kubona minima zo kujayo. Ati: "Ni abandi baba bagikeneye kuja mu mahiganwa kugira ngo barabe ko nabo boshika kuri urwo rwego." Abanonotsi baronswa iyo mfashanyo Bigirimana avuga ko bategerezwa kugenda bakora ivyo basabwa bagatanga na raporo zavyo. Ati: "Mugabo ku rwego rwa Africa naho hari abaronka imfashanyo, kandi na Francine yarimwo, hanyuma kubera atakoze ibisabwa ngo aze aratanga raporo, ngo agende mu mahiganwa basaba, iyo mfashanyo yiwe barayihagaritse, no muri federation yiwe barabizi." Haraheze hafi amezi abiri Francine Niyonsaba abonye minima zo kuja mu nkino olempike. Bigirimana ati "azoheza aronke mubandi ivyo baba bateguye." Bigiramana avuga ko igitigiri c'abaherekeza abanonotsi mu nkino olempike atari igihugu kigishirako. Ati: "Hariho 'logiciel' ushiramwo abanonotsi bari qualifié igaca iguha igitigiri c'ababaherekeza, abo rero kandi si abo muri CNO ni abo muri federation y'iwabo. "Hari umunonotsi yoshika ku rwego urwo arirwo rwose atagira umumenyereza? Atagira president wa federation? Umuntu siwe yigira, umunonotsi agirwa n'urwego arimwo akagirwa n'umumenyereza, n'ubushobozi bwiwe." Francine Niyonsaba agaragaza ko ariko yitegurira izi nkino:

headline: Italy 0-1 North Macedonia: Giorgio Chiellini ati 'turasambuwe kandi turahonyanzwe'
text: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru mu Butaliyano Giorgio Chiellini yavuze ko abo bakinana 'bacitse intege' inyuma yo gutsindwa na Macedoine ya ruguru bakananirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi co mu 2022. Uwo mugwi usanganywe igikombe c'ihiganwa rya Buraya ntuzitaba inkino z'igikombe c'isi ubwa kabiri wikurikiranya inyuma yo kunanirwa kuja mu zabereye mu Burusiya mu 2018. Aleksandar Trajkovski yinjije igitego mu mwanya w'agasunuzo, yatumye haba ku ruhande rumwe umunezero ku rundi na ho amarira. Uwo mukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus yagize ati: "Igihengeri kinini kizoguma muri twebwe. "Nta hantu na hamwe baturushije muri iri joro kiretse ico gitego. Twaronse amahigwe menshi, ariko ku bw'Imana mbi, ntitwashoboye kwinjiza. Hari umwikomo munini. Kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda gushika ubu, twagiye dukora amakosa, none raba aradukozeko. "Ndishimiye uyu mugwi wakoze uko ushoboe. Nta nkeka ko twasambuwe turanahonyangwa. Nizeye ko iki gihengeri kizoduha inguvu kugira dusubire gutangura bushasha. Umumenyereza w'Ubutaliyano Roberto Mancini yashikanye igihugu ciwe ku munezero ukomeye i Buraya mu gutsinda Ubwongereza mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa rya Buraya ryo mu 2020 mu kwezi kw'indwi, ivyashimiwe cane uwo mumenyereza umugwi wiwe utahabwa amahirwe muri iryo higanwa. Uwo mugwi Azzuri wari wahejeje mw'itsinda ari uwa kabiri inyuma y'Ubusuwise, ugutsindwa na Macedoine ya ruguru bikaba bisigura ko uwo mugwi ufise igikombe ca Buraya ugiye kumara imyaka 12 utagaragaye mu nkino zikomeye z'igikombe c'isi mu mupira w'amaguru. Mancini yagize ati: "Muri iri ci narishimye cane, ubu na ho n'akababaro gakomeye. Biragoye kuvuga. "Ndifadikanije n'abakinyi mu mubabaro. Ni umugwi wakinye neza kandi watsindiye igikombe ca Buraya mw'ici riheze kandi babikwiye. Ndababajwe no kuba batazoja mu gikombe c'isi ku ncuro igira kabiri. "Uwo ni wo mupira w'amaguru. Utsinzwe, utegerezwa kubabara mu gacerere, nta kintu ushobora gukora. "Biragoye kuvuga ku rukino twateye mw'igoli incuro 40 tutinjiza, hanyuma tugatsindwa igitego ku munota wa 92. N'uko bimeze." "Abakinyi bafise kazoza keza, barakomeye kandi bafise na kazoza mu mugwi nserukiragihugu. Ni ibihe bigoye, kandi no muri iyi misi igiye gukurikira ni ko bizoba bimeze. Ni yo mategeko y'umupira." Abajijwe kuri kazoza kiwe, Mancini yagize ati: "Ubu haracari kare kuvuga kuri kazoza. Turacari mu kigandaro. "Nk'umuntu, nshobora kuvuga ko nakunze aba basore uyu munsi gusumba igihe twatsinda mu kwezi kw'indwi. Akababaro ni kenshi." Umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubutaliyano akina muri Chelsea Jorgino yemeye ko bafise uruhara ku vyavuye muri urwo rukino, avuga ati: "Birababaje cane. Ndemeza ko twakinye neza, kuko twatembereje umupira neza kandi turanabarusha gukina, ariko ntitwashoboye kwinjiza. Nta we twotako umwikomo ariko ni ko kuri. "Mu nkino zike ziheze, ntitwashoboye kwinjiza kandi twagiye turakora amakosa yadukozeko, kuko abo twakina baronka igitego bateye mw'igoli gake. Biragoye kuko dutegerezwa kuvyakira. Ntitwashoboye gukora neza - ndabifisemwo uruhara kandi birababaje." Umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubutaliyano Marco Verrati yongeyeko ati: "Biragoye gutegera ivyashitse, kuko birababaje cane. Igitego cabo mu minota y'agasunuzo ni nk'indoto. Uyu mugwi wari ufise amahigwe yo kuja mu gikombe c'isi, rero biragoye gutahura ivyashitse muri iri joro. Twe turazi ko twitanze, ubu mu vy'ukuri ni igihe c'uko twibaza twebwe nyene ibibazo bimwe bimwe." Ubutaliyano bubaye igihugu kigira kane gitwaye igikombe ca Buraya ariko kikananirwa kuja mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi, kikaba gikurikiye Tchécoslovaquie, le Danemark na Grèce.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Lukaku, Bernardo, Pogba, Coutinho, Messi, Kounde
text: Inter Milan yiteze ko Chelsea isubira kurondera umusatirizi w'umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 28 yongereje amahera ishaka gutanga, igapfuma ishikana imiriyoni zababa 153 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, inyuma y'aho yankiye imiriyoni 118 z'amadorari kwongerako ukuminyi w'inyuma wa Espagne Marcos Alonso w'imyaka 30. (Mail) Mu gihe Jack Grealish yitezwe cane muri Manchester City, bishobora gutuma Bernardo Silva agenda, mu gihe Barcelona na Atletico Madrid yipfuza uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Portugal w'imyaka 26.  (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Aston Villa yitezwe kubandanya irondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Norwich, umwongereza Todd Cantwell w'imyaka 23 mu gihe Grealish yoramuka yimukiye muri Manchester City ku miriyoni 139 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sky Sports) Atalanta yiteze kugiriranira ibiganiro na Chelsea mu mpera z'iyi ndwi kugira bumvikane ku musatirizi w'umwongereza Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23. (Gianluca di Marzo) Paul Pogba azotangura umwaka w'inkino wimirije mu murwi Manchester United ariko akaba yiteze gufata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe imbere y'uko ikiringo c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi kirangira, mu gihe PSG ikirondera uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa w'imyaka 28. (Telegraph - subscription required) Tottenham irashaka kugura umukinyi wo hagati muri rino ci, aho umwongereza Noni Madueke w'imyaka 21 akina muri PSV Eindhoven hamwe n'umunya Danemark akina ku ruhande Mikkel Damsgaard w'imyaka 21 akina muri Sampdoria, bari ku rutonde rw'abaronderwa. (Standard) Umusatirizi wa Barcelona, umunya Brésil Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 28, ari mu bakinyi baronderwa na Tottenham mu gihe yoramuka igurishije umusatirizi wayo Harry Kane w'imyaka 28. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Lionel Messi yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha na Barcelona mu mpera z'iyi ndwi. Amasezerano yari afitaniye n'uwu murwi yarangiye mu kwezi guheze, ariko uyu musatirizi wa Argentina w'imyaka 34 asa n'uwemeye ayandi masezerano mashasha y'imyaka itanu, ariko umushakara wiwe ukagabanuka gushika ku bice 50%.
